title: Dark Web Sale Reveals 3.6 Crore Stolen AI-Gaming Accounts and Kaspersky Report
description: A recent report by cybersecurity firm Kaspersky has shed light on a concerning trend in the cyber underworld – the rampant sale of stolen credentials from AI-based gaming platforms and services. Over the past three years, an alarming 3.6 crore credentials, including login-password details, have been pilfered and offered for sale on the dark web. […]

title: Robust AI’s Revolutionary Apps Transforming Education, Healthcare
description: Robust AI, a pioneering startup in the realm of artificial intelligence, has launched a suite of groundbreaking apps aimed at revolutionizing education and healthcare. Led by CEO Usman Roshan and lead AI engineer Yunzhe Xue, the company’s innovative apps utilize advanced AI algorithms to provide real-time feedback and personalized coaching on human activity. Among the […]

title: FTX’s Vigilance Amidst Bankruptcy: A Warning Against Unauthorized Bids
description: In a significant move, the FTX Derivatives Exchange, now navigating through bankruptcy, has issued a critical warning to its creditors. The cautionary advice comes as the exchange prepares to meet its obligations to those affected by its dramatic collapse in 2022.  The heart of the warning is to alert creditors about the presence of unauthorized […]
